description: Minimum number of transpositions needed to represent each permutation in the canonical list A055089.
maple: with(group); [seq(count_transpositions(convert(PermRevLexUnrank(j),'disjcyc')),j=0..)];count_transpositions := proc(l) local c,t; t := 0; for c in l do t := t + (nops(c)-1); od; RETURN(t); end;
crossrefs: For minimum number of _adjacent_ transpositions required, see A034968.
author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 18 2000
